explainGoal.text: Polytronome helps you visualize multiple rythms at the same time

explainWheel.text: You can change beats by moving the numbers below

testBeats.text: Let's try to create a 5 on 7

showTempo.text: You can also change the tempo, try it

clickMenu.text: Finally, you can access the menu by clicking here

endEasy.text: That's it for the basics ! Shall we move on to advanced settings ?

startAdvanced.text: Here is all the options you can get

beatsAgain.text: We already know about beats, let's see about the rest

showBeats.text: Use the numbers below to change beats, from 2 to 16 per measure

showNotes.text: Here you can scroll through notes, from C0 through F#5

showWaveType.text: That's the note tone, you can cycle through 4 different wave types

showDuration.text: Note duration. [1/4] is the shortest, [Full] is not silenced

showRelease.text: Note sustain. Sound lasts longer after note is played

showVolume.text: Finally volume, you can mute by clicking on the icon

aboutKeybindings.text: You can also use your computer keyboard ! Look at the docs for more infos
